CREATED.title: Request Created
CREATED.message: Permission Request has been created, but not validated or sent to a permission administrator

VALIDATED.title: Request Validated
VALIDATED.message: The permission request has been validated.

MALFORMED.title: Request Malformed
MALFORMED.message: The permission request is malformed. Send it again to retry validation.

UNABLE_TO_SEND.title: Request Not Sent
UNABLE_TO_SEND.message: We are unable to send the permission request to the permission administrator. Please contact your service provider.

SENT_TO_PERMISSION_ADMINISTRATOR.title: Request Sent
SENT_TO_PERMISSION_ADMINISTRATOR.message: The permission request is now being processed by the permission administrator.

TIMED_OUT.title: Request Timed Out
TIMED_OUT.message: The permission request was not accepted by the user in time. Please try again.

ACCEPTED.title: Request Accepted
ACCEPTED.message: The user accepted the permission request.

REJECTED.title: Request Rejected
REJECTED.message: The user rejected the permission request.

INVALID.title: Invalid Request
INVALID.message: The permission request is not formatted correctly or contains semantic errors and is invalid.

REVOKED.title: Request Revoked
REVOKED.message: The user revoked the permission via the permission administrator or the permission administrator themselves removed the permission.

TERMINATED.title: Request Terminated
TERMINATED.message: The permission was terminated by the eligible party.

FULFILLED.title: Request Fulfilled
FULFILLED.message: The permission request has been fulfilled, i.e. all data has been delivered.

UNFULFILLABLE.title: Request Unfulfillable
UNFULFILLABLE.message: The permission request specifies energy data that is not available for that final customer.

REQUIRES_EXTERNAL_TERMINATION.title: Requires External Termination
REQUIRES_EXTERNAL_TERMINATION.message: A follow-up state for UNFULFILLABLE, FULFILLED, TERMINATED, since sometimes these states have to be externally terminated.

EXTERNALLY_TERMINATED.title: Externally Terminated
EXTERNALLY_TERMINATED.message: The external termination process was successful
